name: boxarr
tagline: A web interface for managing and organizing Docker Compose applications
description: Boxarr provides an easy-to-use web UI for managing Docker Compose stacks. It helps users control, monitor, and visualize self-hosted containers and applications through configuration groupings and environment presets.

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Control Docker Compose stacks through web UI. Visual management

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: User-friendly UI for container management. No command line needed

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Perfect for managing self-hosted applications. Simplified operations

features.title: Docker Support
features.description: Quick deployment for Docker environments. Start managing quickly
